items.description: Show your quirky side by placing these fun Android stickers on your personal belongings.

items.name: Google Bot
items.description: This Google Bot can hold multiple poses making it a fun toy for all. Fold the Google Bot back up into a perfect cube when you are done playing.

items.name: Google Emoji Sticker Pack
items.description: Who doesn't use emojis? Decorate your space with your current mood!

items.name: Waze Pack of 9 Decal Set
items.description: Can't decide which Waze decal to get? We have made that decision easier for you! Now you can purchase a pack of nine Waze Mood Decals!

items.name: Google Twill Cap
items.description: Classic urban styling distinguishes this Google cap. Retains its shape, even when not being worn.

items.name: Google Fold-over Beanie Grey
items.description: Keep you ears warm while enjoying a cold winter day with this Google Fold-over Beanie.

items.name: Google Pom Beanie Charcoal
items.description: Stay stylish and warm this winter season with this Google Pom Beanie.

items.name: Waze Women's Short Sleeve Tee

items.description: Made of soft tri-blend jersey fabric, this great t-shirt will help you find your Waze. Made in USA.

items.name: Google Rucksack

items.name: Google Rolltop Backpack Blue
items.description: This stylish Google rolltop backpack will help keep all of your favorite items organized and together while you're on the move.

items.name: Android Trace Bottle Black

items.name: Android Trace Mug Black
